description: Julie 2.0 Phase 5b MAJOR MILESTONE: TOON formatting successfully integrated into fast_search and fast_refs tools! Achieved 66.9% token savings (nearly DOUBLE the 35% target). Created encode_to_toon_with_fallback helper with graceful degradation, added output_format parameter with 3 modes (json/toon/auto), auto mode intelligently selects TOON for 5+ results. 5 comprehensive tests passing. Backwards compatible - JSON default, TOON opt-in. Fixed ALL test files to include new fields. fast_explore integration deferred as lower priority.
